description:
I`ve learned a truth I don`t want to believe, but I can`t allow myself to stop now. I keep running. To block the electromagnetic waves causing evols to go out of control, I head to Loveland TV Tower. When I arrive, enforcement teams from Black Swan are already there. Left with no help, and no path left to take... behind me appears someone who was supposed to be missing.
Source: crunchyroll
